data.enText: to become better than before; to make sth/sb better than before

data.chText: 手术后他的生活质量大大改善了。
data.enText: His quality of life has improved dramatically since the operation.

data.chText: 医生说她还会继续康复。
data.enText: The doctor says she should continue to improve (= after an illness) .

data.chText: 公司需要在所有这些方面改善业绩。
data.enText: The company needs to improve performance in all these areas.

data.chText: 我得提高我的法语水平。
data.enText: I need to improve my French.

data.chText: 改进；做出比…更好的成绩
data.enText: to achieve or produce sth that is of a better quality than sth else

data.chText: 我们的业绩的确超过了去年的数字。
data.enText: We've certainly improved on last year's figures.

data.chText: 改进；做出比…更好的成绩
data.enText: to achieve or produce sth that is of a better quality than sth else

data.chText: 我们的业绩的确超过了去年的数字。
data.enText: We've certainly improved on last year's figures.

example: The editor improved the manuscript with his changes

value.def: If something improves or if you improve it, it gets better.

example.ex: Both the texture and condition of your hair should improve...
example.tran: 你头发的发质与健康状况都应改善。

example.ex: The weather is beginning to improve...

example.tran: 形势不会因时间而有所改善。

value.def: If a skill you have improves or you improve a skill, you get better at it.

example.ex: He said he was going to improve his football.
example.tran: 他说他要提高足球技术。

value.def: If you improve after an illness or an injury, your health gets better or you get stronger.

example.ex: He had improved so much the doctor had cut his dosage.
example.tran: 他康复很快,医生已减少了用药剂量。

value.def: If you improve on a previous achievement of your own or of someone else, you achieve a better standard or result.

example.ex: We need to improve on our performance against France.
example.tran: 我们需要比对阵法国队时表现得更好。

trans: 提高效率；提高效益；改善效率；提升效率；效率提高
